htmlDescription:
Mansaky Hajj and umrah ERP Systems, a next-generation platform designed specifically to transform Hajj and Umrah operations using the power of AI and smart automation.

Whether you're managing thousands of pilgrims or organizing trips from multiple countries, we understand the complexity — and we’ve built something that makes it simpler, smarter, and faster.

✨ Why Mansaky?

Mansaky Systems brings together everything you need into one smart platform:

🔍 AI-Powered Passport Processing

Instantly read and extract information from thousands of passports in bulk for visa grouping and trip registration — no manual entry, no delays.


🧠 Smart Workflow Automation

From visa approvals to trip scheduling, Mansaky automates the entire process — saving your team hours of repetitive work.

🏨🚌⛺ Smart Accommodation Management

Assign and track hotels, buses, and tents in real-time. The system automatically balances group sizes with availability to reduce errors and maximize comfort.

📱 Pilgrim Mobile App

Your pilgrims get their full trip details, schedules, hotel info, bus pickup times, room/tent assignments — all through a mobile app that speaks their language.

📊 Real-Time Control Center

Track your teams, groups, and operations live — across all locations and services. You’re never in the dark.

members.biography: Sr. Mobile Developer

As the CEO and Co-founder of From Scratch, I drive the creation of cutting-edge web and mobile solutions that redefine client expectations. My expertise in PHP, Laravel, and modern web technologies empowers our team to develop intuitive software platforms and robust APIs. With a proven track record as a web development expert, I blend technical prowess with innovative thinking to deliver seamless, high-performance solutions.

At From Scratch, I lead a talented team dedicated to transforming ideas into powerful digital experiences. My journey in web development includes senior roles at Nitro and Mart Plus, where I optimized platform functionality and designed secure, high-performance systems. My background in mechatronics engineering gives me a unique perspective, combining engineering principles with software development to tackle complex challenges.

Yasser Al-Jboory serves as Vice President and Project Manager at Mansaky Systems, where digital solutions for Hajj and Umrah operations are led with a focus on smart automation and operational efficiency. With over 20 years of experience, large-scale projects have been managed to streamline visa processing, accommodation logistics, and field coordination through AI-driven systems. Strategic planning, compliance alignment, and cross-team execution are consistently delivered to support service providers in high-demand pilgrimage environments.

name: ALDEAFAH INTERNATIONAL GROUP FOR UMRAH SERVICE
description: شركة مجموعة الضيافة العالمية  اسمٌ رائدٌ في قطاع الضيافة، تشتهر بإدارة مجموعةٍ من الفنادق الفاخرة الواقعة على بعد  خطواتٍ من المسجد الحرام في مكة المكرمة  بفضل فهمنا العميق لاحتياجات الحجاج والمسافرين، نقدم مزيجًا فريدًا من السكينة الروحية والراحة العصرية وخدمات تموين عالمية المستوى من خلال مطبخنا المركزي المجهز بأحدث التقنيات.انطلاقا من قيم الضيافة الإسلامية، تلتزم مجموعة الضيافة العالمية  بتقديم خدمة استثنائية وتجارب روحية غنية لضيوفها من جميع أنحاء العالم. صُممت فنادقنا بعناية فائقة لتوفير بيئات هادئة ومرحبة تعكس الأهمية المقدسة لمحيطها، مع الالتزام بأعلى معايير الضيافة المعاصرة.نسعى باستمرار للارتقاء بخدماتنا من خلال الابتكار والرعاية الشخصية والممارسات المستدامة. وتماشيًا مع رؤية السعودية 2030، نهدف إلى دعم رسالة المملكة في تحسين جودة الحياة وترسيخ مكانة المملكة كوجهة عالمية رائدة للسياحة الدينية. سواءً كان ذلك لأداء مناسك العمرة أو الزيارة أو زيارة المدينة المنورة، تفخرمجموعة الضيافة العالمية  بكونها الخيار الأمثل لإقامة لا تُنسى وروحانية مُرضية بالقرب من أحد أقدس المواقع الإسلامية

انطلاقا من قيم الضيافة الإسلامية، تلتزم مجموعة الضيافة العالمية بتقديم خدمة استثنائية وتجارب روحية غنية لضيوفها من جميع أنحاء العالم. صُممت فنادقنا بعناية فائقة لتوفير بيئات هادئة ومرحبة تعكس الأهمية المقدسة لمحيطها، مع الالتزام بأعلى معايير الضيافة المعاصرة.


نسعى باستمرار للارتقاء بخدماتنا من خلال الابتكار والرعاية الشخصية والممارسات المستدامة. وتماشيًا مع رؤية السعودية 2030، نهدف إلى دعم رسالة المملكة في تحسين جودة الحياة وترسيخ مكانة المملكة كوجهة عالمية رائدة للسياحة الدينية. سواءً كان ذلك لأداء مناسك العمرة أو الزيارة أو زيارة المدينة المنورة، تفخرمجموعة الضيافة العالمية بكونها الخيار الأمثل لإقامة لا تُنسى وروحانية مُرضية بالقرب من أحد أقدس المواقع الإسلامية

name: Qasswa Hajj and Umrah Company .Ltd
description: Qasswa – Leading Umrah & Tourism Services DMC Founded in 1981 in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, Qasswa DMC is a premier provider of Umrah and tourism services in KSA, catering to guests from around the world. Inspired by the camel of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH), our name reflects our commitment to serving guests with excellence and hospitality.Qasswa specializes in Umrah visa processing, premium transportation, airport meet & assist, and hotel accommodations in Makkah, Madinah, Jeddah and across Saudi Arabia. We also offer customized tourism experiences, including cultural and historical tours, as part of our Umrah Plus packages.With decades of expertise, Qasswa continues to enhance our guests journey, ensuring comfort, convenience, and a spiritually enriching experience for every traveler.
htmlDescription:
Qasswa – Leading Umrah & Tourism Services DMC

Founded in 1981 in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, Qasswa DMC is a premier provider of Umrah and tourism services in KSA, catering to guests from around the world. Inspired by the camel of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH), our name reflects our commitment to serving guests with excellence and hospitality.

Qasswa specializes in Umrah visa processing, premium transportation, airport meet & assist, and hotel accommodations in Makkah, Madinah, Jeddah and across Saudi Arabia. We also offer customized tourism experiences, including cultural and historical tours, as part of our Umrah Plus packages.

With decades of expertise, Qasswa continues to enhance our guests journey, ensuring comfort, convenience, and a spiritually enriching experience for every traveler.

members.biography:
**Biography of a Key Account Manager in Umrah and Tourism**

A seasoned professional with a deep understanding of the Umrah and tourism industry, the Key Account Manager in this field plays a vital role in fostering relationships with key clients, managing partnerships, and delivering exceptional services to ensure customer satisfaction. With extensive experience in coordinating travel arrangements, accommodations, transportation, and special Umrah packages, this professional works closely with clients to tailor unique travel experiences.

In addition to managing client relationships, the Key Account Manager is responsible for understanding market trends, identifying new opportunities, and ensuring smooth operations throughout the travel process. Their expertise in navigating complex logistical arrangements, combined with a strong network of trusted suppliers and service providers, ensures that clients receive the highest level of service.

Having a passion for the cultural and spiritual significance of Umrah, the Key Account Manager strives to offer clients a seamless and memorable journey, while also driving business growth. Through proactive communication, negotiation, and strategic planning, they play an instrumental role in growing their organization’s presence in the Umrah and tourism market.

I'm a seasoned Corporate Manager who is deeply passionate about Travel industry and Customer Experience. I have a knack for crafting effective strategies and turning them into tangible business results. My core strengths lie in planning and executing marketing strategies, underpinned by a deep understanding of market and consumer behavior.

description: Rua Taiba Company – A Gateway to Spiritual HospitalityRua Taiba Company is a leading name in the hospitality sector, renowned for managing a collection of luxury hotels located just steps away from the Prophet’s Mosque in Al Madinah Al Munawwarah. With a deep understanding of the needs of pilgrims and travelers, we offer a unique blend of spiritual serenity, modern comfort, and world-class catering services through our state-of-the-art central kitchen.Rooted in the values of Islamic hospitality, Rua Taiba is committed to delivering exceptional service and spiritually enriching experiences to guests from all over the world. Our hotels are meticulously designed to provide tranquil, welcoming environments that reflect the sacred significance of their surroundings—while upholding the highest standards of contemporary hospitality.Driven by our vision to become the region’s leading hospitality brand, we continually strive to elevate our services through innovation, personalized care, and sustainable practices. In alignment with Saudi Vision 2030, we aim to support the Kingdom’s mission to enhance quality of life and position Saudi Arabia as a premier global destination for religious tourism. Whether for Umrah, Ziyarah, or a visit to Madinah, Rua Taiba is proud to be the preferred choice for a memorable and spiritually fulfilling stay near one of Islam’s holiest sites.
htmlDescription:
Rua Taiba Company – A Gateway to Spiritual Hospitality

Rua Taiba Company is a leading name in the hospitality sector, renowned for managing a collection of luxury hotels located just steps away from the Prophet’s Mosque in Al Madinah Al Munawwarah. With a deep understanding of the needs of pilgrims and travelers, we offer a unique blend of spiritual serenity, modern comfort, and world-class catering services through our state-of-the-art central kitchen.

Rooted in the values of Islamic hospitality, Rua Taiba is committed to delivering exceptional service and spiritually enriching experiences to guests from all over the world. Our hotels are meticulously designed to provide tranquil, welcoming environments that reflect the sacred significance of their surroundings—while upholding the highest standards of contemporary hospitality.

Driven by our vision to become the region’s leading hospitality brand, we continually strive to elevate our services through innovation, personalized care, and sustainable practices. In alignment with Saudi Vision 2030, we aim to support the Kingdom’s mission to enhance quality of life and position Saudi Arabia as a premier global destination for religious tourism. Whether for Umrah, Ziyarah, or a visit to Madinah, Rua Taiba is proud to be the preferred choice for a memorable and spiritually fulfilling stay near one of Islam’s holiest sites.

members.biography:
With a dedicated focus on operations management within the travel and tourism industry, particularly in the domain of Umrah and Ziyarah services, Safuvan has become a trusted figure in delivering seamless travel experiences.

Specializing in the strategic management of tour operations, Safuvan has developed innovative solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of pilgrims. This includes optimizing travel logistics, ensuring regulatory compliance, and enhancing customer satisfaction through personalized service.

As an integral part of Modern guest umrah services, Safuvan has contributed significantly to advancing operational efficiencies and fostering partnerships within the travel and tourism sector. With a passion for creating meaningful journeys and a commitment to excellence, Safuvan continues to elevate the standards of service for Umrah and Ziyarah travelers worldwide.

name: Qafilat Altawhid international Group
description: "قافلة التوحيد أحد شركات تنظيم قدوم المعتمرين من الخارج وعندما تصبح أحد وكلائنا فكن على يقين بأنك تستطيع أن تحصل على افضل الخدمات والبرامج المميزه والميزة التنافسية والمتنوعة حيث ستجد السرعة في الإنجاز والمرونة في العمل والتعاون والتواصل المستمر. الفنادق : • تختار قافلة التوحيد فنادقها بعناية بالغة بكافة مستوياتها وفئاتها ومسافتها من الحرمين الشريفين وذلك من خلال التعاقدات المبكرة بما يلبي رغبات ومتطلبات العملاء من مختلف الجنسيات والأماكن. النقل : • تقدم قافلة التوحيد خدمة الإستقبال والتوديع من المطارات والموانئ وكذلك التنقل بين المشاعر والحرمين الشريفين والمزارات بأعداد متنوعة من وسائل النقل والمواصلات الحديثة والمريحة. لإرشاد السياحي : • توفر قافلة التوحيد برامج للمزارات الدينية والتاريخية والأسواق التجارية وذلك برفقة مرشدين ذو خبرة."

members.biography: Hello, let's connect!

Leading the charge in Revenue Management and Strategic Planning across diverse hotel portfolios, I am dedicated to crafting visionary revenue optimization frameworks and propelling commercial initiatives toward sustainable and dynamic growth. 

My recent tenure as Cluster Director of Revenue Management and Strategies has refined my expertise in orchestrating cross-functional efforts, including sales, marketing, and distribution strategies, to consistently surpass market benchmarks and deliver exceptional results.

With a deep-rooted specialization in the hospitality industry, I possess a keen ability to navigate intricate regulatory landscapes and anticipate market shifts, ensuring our strategies remain both competitive and attuned to evolving customer expectations. 

Bolstered by a Certified Hospitality Revenue Management accreditation, my analytical acumen empowers me to execute precision-driven revenue strategies that elevate both operational performance and financial outcomes.

This combination of strategic foresight and data-driven execution has consistently enhanced the reputation of the hotels I’ve led, positioning them as leaders in both service excellence and profitability.

group.name: Exhibitors
group.announcementMessage:
Welcome to the UZF App

Welcome to the UZF App - a web and app tool designed to boost your company’s presence, connect you with key Umrah leads, and ensure a smooth experience at the Umrah and Ziyarah Forum 2025. Available pre- and post-event (April 14-16, Madinah), it’s your key to maximising every moment.

Download the app on your mobile to manage all the essentials-your badge, lead scanning, and more-in one place.


NEW - Lead Scanning Feature

Capture leads effortlessly at UZF 2025 with our app’s lead scanning tool. Open the camera icon in the menu, allow access, and scan attendee badges unlimitedly. Check the Lead Retrieval Guide for simple steps.


Digital Badge

UZF embraces a greener future with digital badges. Your QR-coded badge grants onsite entry - no printing is needed. To access your digital badge, simply click on My Badge on the event's home page.


With the Event Planner, leave stress behind and step into a productive, inspiring UZF experience - connecting you with 20,000+ Umrah leaders.

Questions? Contact Us:

  • Email: uzfcs@tahaluf.com
  • WhatsApp: +966 555 953 750
  • Hotline: +966 11 408 2888
  • Hours: Sun-Thu, 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM (AST)

Exhibitor Hours:

  • Day 1: 10 am – 10 pm
  • Day 2: 9 am – 7 pm
  • Day 3: 9 am – 7 pm

name: Qasswa
description: Over the past 4 decades, Qasswa has served millions of visitors from around the world, enhancing their journeys through comprehensive programs that include accommodation, transportation, visa services, sightseeing tours, and historical excursions — all delivered with the highest standards of Saudi hospitality and quality.Why the name “Qasswa”?The name “Qasswa” is inspired by the camel of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ, which he rode on his pilgrimage to Makkah. This name reflects our vision of enabling visitors to embark on a smooth, spiritual, or leisure-filled journey marked by comfort, peace of mind, and a deep connection to the cultural and Islamic identity of Saudi Arabia.Our VisionTo be the leading provider of tourism and travel solutions in Saudi Arabia by delivering enriching experiences that include Umrah programs, leisure tourism, historical visits, and cultural tours — with a full commitment to the highest standards of quality and excellence in serving the guests of the Kingdom.Our ServicesUmrah visa processing for individuals and groupsHotel bookings in all major cities across the KingdomPremium transportation services to and from airports and between citiesMeet-and-assist services at Saudi airportsGuided tours to prominent Islamic landmarksWhy Qasswa?Over 40 years of experience in domestic tourismA multilingual team specialized in guest servicesStrategic partnerships with top hotels across Saudi Arabia24/7 customer support and assistanceFlexible programs to suit all budgets and interests
htmlDescription:
Over the past 4 decades, Qasswa has served millions of visitors from around the world, enhancing their journeys through comprehensive programs that include accommodation, transportation, visa services, sightseeing tours, and historical excursions — all delivered with the highest standards of Saudi hospitality and quality.

Why the name “Qasswa”?

The name “Qasswa” is inspired by the camel of Prophet Muhammad ﷺ, which he rode on his pilgrimage to Makkah. This name reflects our vision of enabling visitors to embark on a smooth, spiritual, or leisure-filled journey marked by comfort, peace of mind, and a deep connection to the cultural and Islamic identity of Saudi Arabia.

Our Vision

To be the leading provider of tourism and travel solutions in Saudi Arabia by delivering enriching experiences that include Umrah programs, leisure tourism, historical visits, and cultural tours — with a full commitment to the highest standards of quality and excellence in serving the guests of the Kingdom.

Our Services

Umrah visa processing for individuals and groups

Hotel bookings in all major cities across the Kingdom

Premium transportation services to and from airports and between cities

Meet-and-assist services at Saudi airports

Guided tours to prominent Islamic landmarks

Why Qasswa?

Over 40 years of experience in domestic tourism

A multilingual team specialized in guest services

Strategic partnerships with top hotels across Saudi Arabia

24/7 customer support and assistance

Flexible programs to suit all budgets and interests

members.biography: I'm a seasoned Corporate Manager who is deeply passionate about Travel industry and Customer Experience. I have a knack for crafting effective strategies and turning them into tangible business results. My core strengths lie in planning and executing marketing strategies, underpinned by a deep understanding of market and consumer behavior.

group.name: Exhibitors
group.announcementMessage:
Welcome to the UZF App

Welcome to the UZF App - a web and app tool designed to boost your company’s presence, connect you with key Umrah leads, and ensure a smooth experience at the Umrah and Ziyarah Forum 2025. Available pre- and post-event (April 14-16, Madinah), it’s your key to maximising every moment.

Download the app on your mobile to manage all the essentials-your badge, lead scanning, and more-in one place.


NEW - Lead Scanning Feature

Capture leads effortlessly at UZF 2025 with our app’s lead scanning tool. Open the camera icon in the menu, allow access, and scan attendee badges unlimitedly. Check the Lead Retrieval Guide for simple steps.


Digital Badge

UZF embraces a greener future with digital badges. Your QR-coded badge grants onsite entry - no printing is needed. To access your digital badge, simply click on My Badge on the event's home page.


With the Event Planner, leave stress behind and step into a productive, inspiring UZF experience - connecting you with 20,000+ Umrah leaders.
